author: craigmcc
msg: Add the first two of a series of unit tests for the JNDI naming context
that is provided to web applications by Tomcat 4.0.  The initial tests
exercize the ability to retrieve environment entries created by
<env-entry> elements in the web application deployment descriptor.
NOTE:  One of the requirements on the provided context is that
applications should not be able to modify it.  The context returned by
Tomcat 4.0 currently fails to enforce this, so the calls to the Jndi01
